name: Red Run (Origami Unicorn)
description:
RED RUN - ORIGAMI UNICORN

Hi Gamer,

Red Run is a short jumping platform game which have challenging levels. I decided to make a game which I can use lights in it, to improve my skills in unity. As a result, I made a simple platform game. I hope you like this game and have a fun time.

Controls:

Move = Arrow Keys (or A,D)

Jump = Space

Credits:

Thanks to LEGNOPS for Red Hood Character Sprites.

Thanks to BAKUDAS for Generic Dungeon Pack.

It would be nice if you give rating and review  or comment about the game.

Thank you for playing.
